thread.title: Do you want internet?
thread.title_full: Do you want internet? - Review of Hotel 17, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Purewinter
title: Do you want internet?
text: The staff seemed to be friendly, the place was very average, had a few problems though, i had no control of the heating it seemed to randomly turn on and off the bar heater and so i would have to use the window to cool room down if got too hot and couldnt turn on if it got to cold. When the heater was on though it sounded like there were people taking a shower in our room or outside our window was very loud and couldnt turn it off. Also the wifi was only working for half of our stay and we had to call the front desk a few times a day to get the router reset and eventually gave up and used the free NYC wifi outside the building.
